mapper.select: SELECT parent.menu_id,parent.del_flag,parent.remark, child.menu_id AS child_menu_id, child.del_flag as child_del_flag,child.remark as child_remark,child.menu_parent_id as child_menu_parent_id FROM sys_menu parent left JOIN sys_menu child ON parent.menu_id = child.menu_parent_id and child.del_flag = '0' where parent.del_flag='0' and parent.menu_parent_id = '0' and parent.label is not null and parent.label != ""

select distinct m.perms from sys_user_role ur left join sys_role r on ur.role_id = r.role_id left join sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id left join sys_menu m on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id where user_id = #{userid} and r.status = 0 and m.status = 0
select distinct sr.role_key from sys_user_role sur left join sys_role sr on sur.user_id = sr.role_id where sur.user_id = #{userid} and sr.status = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu t SET t.is_Leaf = ( SELECT CASE WHEN t.menu_id IN ( SELECT menu_id FROM ( SELECT menu_id FROM sys_menu sm WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sys_menu WHERE sm.menu_id = menu_parent_id and del_flag = '0' ) ) tmp ) THEN '0' ELSE '1' END );
mapper.select: select srm.menu_id from sys_role_menu srm left join sys_menu sm on srm.menu_id = sm.menu_id where role_id =#{roleId} and sm.del_flag = '0'
